name: Doffee shoppe (LD51)
description:
Story:

You are a (non-paid) worker for a company called Doffee (Doughnut + Coffee) who prides themselves in quick shipping time for every order.

Tutorial on playing:

For the first 10 seconds, nothing happens to give you some time to prepare. Every 10 seconds another order comes in, if there are more orders than you can take at once: you lose.

Something happens after your first 10 orders, play to find out what!

In order to complete an order, you must create a matching item to that onscreen and then interact with the correct counter to turn it in.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z key - Interact

LD51 theme:

Every 10 seconds
